item.title: Nashville Favorites
item.description:
Living in California during the pandemic definitely has me missing home. I thought it would be helpful to put together a list of my favorite spots back in Music City.

Food & Drinks

  • Hattie B’s Hot Chicken
  • Martin’s Bar-B-Cue Joint
  • Five Points Pizza
  • DeSano Pizza
  • The Patterson House
  • M.L. Rose
  • Kayne Prime Steakhouse
  • Virago Sushi
  • Pinewood Social
  • Pucket’s Grocery & Restaurant
  • Otaku Ramen
  • Tacqueria Del Sol
  • Burger Up
  • Las Paletas
  • TaquerÃ­a La Juquilita

Coffee & Breakfast

  • 8th & Roast
  • Frothy Monkey
  • Barista Parlor
  • Proper Bagel
  • Steadfast
  • Fido

Breweries

  • Jackolope Brewing Company
  • Yazoo Brewing Company
  • Tennessee Brew Works
  • Fat Bottom Brewing
  • Tailgate Brewery

Entertainment

  • Robert’s Western World
  • Rudy’s Jazzroom
  • House of Cards
  • Headquarters Beercade
  • Schermerhorn Symphony Center
  • Ascend Amphitheatre
  • See a game for any of our sports teams
  • Pick almost any bar or restaurant and you’ll find live music

Outdoors

  • Centennial Park
  • Percy Warner Park
  • Long Hunter State Park
  • Sevier Park
